column4: how do i edit my resolution on my nvidia logo and login screen so its 1024x768?
how do i edit my resolution on my nvidia logo and login screen so its 1024x768?
are you looking for a way to change your screen resolution?
Computer -> System config -> Screen resolution (maybe just resolution)
so you are fine with the desktop resolution, just not with the gdm resolution? or what?
or sudo cp ... ... for bkup first
that will tell you that u need to enter a destination file too.
also, I would believe the wiki has a search function
